input.sentences: i went to my friends house yesterday .
i got to meet her kids .
she was very happy to see me .
i also met her brother while i was there .
we played a lot of games together .
output.sentences: Wow, aren't I looking fine today?
But hey look! My children look even better.
And a family picture plus one!
My daughter is doing her homework and I am now distracting her.
